text:
"Bring Me the Head of Mavis Davis" is a 1997 British dark comedy movie. It is directed by John Henderson. Actors include: Rik Mayall, Jane Horrocks, Danny Aiello, Ronald Pickup, Marc Warren and Ross Boatman.
The movie and plot reference the Sam Peckinpah 1974 movie "Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia".

annotations.surface_form: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
